title: Survivors of music festival massacre on how they escaped - and the decision that saved their lives
description: A helicopter gunship fired into the near distance in Gaza and a cloud of black smoke began to rise as I walked along the road that leads to the scene of the worst terror attack in Israeli history.

title: 'Will we be alive tomorrow?': Terrified mother fears for her family as bombs hit Gaza
description: A desperate and afraid mother in the Gaza Strip has told Sky News she fears her family might not survive the night, as bombs were heard crashing in the background.

title: Senior officer 'ignored concerns' about Special Forces 'kill unit' in Afghanistan, inquiry told
description: Concerns were ignored by a senior officer in the Special Forces that there was a "deliberate policy" in Helmand, Afghanistan, to kill all fighting-aged males, irrespective of whether they posed a threat or not, an inquiry has heard.

title: Hamas threatens to execute civilian hostages if Israel bombs Gaza without warning
description: Hamas has said it will execute an Israeli hostage in response to any new Gaza Strip bombings that come without a pre-warning - moments after a senior figure from the group told Sky News civilian captives would be treated "humanely".

title: Bullets, kidnap and terror: How the Hamas attack on an Israeli music festival unfolded
description: Israel's Supernova festival descended into chaos after Hamas gunmen stormed the desert event, killing hundreds of partygoers and kidnapping others in one of the militant group's deadliest attacks.

title: Grandmother taken by Hamas 'suffering every minute' without her medicine, family says
description: The granddaughter of an elderly woman taken hostage by Hamas has warned she is without medicine and "in a lot of pain".

title: Israel-Hamas War: Explaining what's happened and what might happen next
description: On the Sky News Daily, Niall Paterson is joined by our Middle East correspondent Alistair Bunkall to take a closer look at the Israel-Hamas war - including the Israeli reaction to the weekend's attack and what it may do next.

title: Israel would be compelled to respond if Iran had direct involvement in Hamas attack
description: The scale and complexity of an unprecedented attack by Hamas militants on Israel has raised questions about whether the Palestinian group received direct support from Iran, analysts have said.

title: Scotland's first minister says his parents-in-law are trapped in Gaza after Hamas attack on Israel
description: Scotland's first minister has said his parents-in-law are "trapped" in Gaza and is fearful whether they will "make it through the night or not".

title: Smart mouthguard technology to be adopted in rugby
description: Mouthguards fitted with smart technology to help detect brain injuries sustained by players are to be adopted in professional rugby union.

title: More than 10 Britons 'feared dead or missing' in Israel
description: More than 10 Britons are feared dead or missing in Israel, Sky News understands.

title: How Hamas attack caught Israel off guard
description: Israel was caught off guard by Hamas's careful and devastating attack, with the force using bulldozers, hang gliders and motorbikes against the Middle East's most powerful army.

title: Nobel prize awarded to historian for gender gap research
description: An American economic historian who examined wage inequality between men and women with research experts believe will have "vast societal implications" has won the 2023 Nobel economics prize.

title: What weapons do Israel and Hamas's militaries have?
description: Volleys of rockets have been launched at Israel, blazing fire through the sky. Airstrikes have rained down on the densely populated Gaza Strip. The threat of Israeli tanks rolling across the border in a ground invasion is very real.

title: Oil prices jump as Israel-Hamas war raises concerns over Middle East tensions
description: Oil prices have risen over fears the Israel-Hamas fighting could involve more nations in the Middle East.

title: Why the prospect of this conflict being 'contained to Gaza' seems improbable
description: There are two parallel anxieties right now in terms of how all this unfolds.

title: Fighting against Hamas continues in up to eight locations inside Israel after war formally declared
description: Israeli forces are actively fighting Hamas in as many as eight locations inside Israel, after the country formally declared war.

title: Israel formally declares war as airstrikes against Hamas continue for second night
description: Israel has formally declared war on Hamas and gave the green light for "significant military steps" to be taken.
